title: The disloyal favourite or, The unfortunate states-man. Who seeks by fond desire for to climb may chance to catch a fall before his time for fortune is as fickle, as the wind, to him that bears a proud ambious [sic] mind. Tune of, Sawny will ne'r be my love again.
publisher: Printed for W. Thackeray, T. Passinger, and W. Whitwood.,
